code: import React,{useEffect,useRef}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NumberPresenter=_ref=>{let{base,exponentsAndOperators}=_ref;const containerRef=useRef(null);const generateFormula=()=>{let formula=`${base}^{${exponentsAndOperators[0]}}`;for(let i=1;i<exponentsAndOperators.length;i+=2){if(exponentsAndOperators[i]==='/'){formula+=` \\cdot ${base}^{${exponentsAndOperators[i+1]}}`;}else{formula+=` ${exponentsAndOperators[i]} ${base}^{${exponentsAndOperators[i+1]}}`;}}return`\\[${formula}\\]`;};useEffect(()=>{if(containerRef.current&&window.MathJax){window.MathJax.typesetPromise([containerRef.current]);}},[base,exponentsAndOperators]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{ref:containerRef,className:"p-4 bg-gray-100 rounded-lg",children:generateFormula()});};export default NumberPresenter;
